title: 09/07/21 DPS Hour 3 Greg McElroy
itunes:title: 09/07/21 DPS Hour 3 Greg McElroy
description:
In this hour of The Dan Patrick Show, the guys debate what they would rather have: a college football national championship or a Heisman trophy. Also, lots of beer talk and reminiscing about beer. Finally, former Alabama quarterback and current college football commentator Greg McElroy joins the show to talk N.I.L., bad Saturdays for certain college football teams, and more!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
